scripts.install:all: npm install && cd infra/cdk && npm install && cd ../../service/product && npm install
scripts.deploy:products: cd infra/cdk && npm run build && cdk deploy BackStack
scripts.deploy:import: cd infra/cdk && npm run build && cdk deploy ImportStack
scripts.deploy:auth: cd infra/cdk && npm run build && cdk deploy AuthStack
scripts.deploy:all: cd infra/cdk && npm run build && cdk deploy --all
scripts.test: npm run test:product && npm run test:import
